Unknown Pattern Generator

  1. API

API

get-hex-base-digitnil
  • Get current hex base unknown digit by current state. A specific state always give the same digit.
set-hex-base-digit(digit-to-set)
  • Set digit-to-set into the generator which changes the current state.
get-statenil
  • Get current version and current state of the generator.
set-state(state-representation &key (by-some-random nil) (by-libgirl-unknown-system nil))
  • Set the generator to the state by state-representation.
  • Set the state as a random state if by-some-random is t.
  • Set the state as a Libgirl system decided state if by-libgirl-unknown-system is t.
  • Error will be raised if both of above two are t.

Created with Codex.
